profile.name: Erik
profile.description:
I'm a recent graduate from Codeworks (Barcelona) who really enjoys coding and is eager to learn. 
The computer science world of one of my passions and  I love to have the opportunity to work on it.
I've been working as a Senior Technical Support Agent for almost two years at Glovo and in July I decided to give a step ahead in my career and do a Bootcamp.

I enjoy a lot of practicing sports and I recently discovered the world of finance and I'm enjoying it a lot.
I'm a super curious person that always wants to learn as much as possible and go further in things I'm interested in.
